name: Pet Rock Friendclub
description:
Created in 72 hours as a part of Ludum Dare 33: "You Are the Monster." During the game jam, we split the team and made two projects simultaneously, the other coming in the form of Monster Truck Story.

You just received a pet rock, but it needs a personality. Paint it, name it, and introduce your new friend to everyone around town!

Most of the team was comprised of members of PolyKnight Games. We're currently working on our first commercial game, InnerSpace, which we've spent much more than 48-hours developing.

While this game's free, any donations will go to the development of InnerSpace.

If you like it, let us know!

Twitter- @PolyKnightGames

Instagram- @polyknightgames

Facebook- fb.com/polyknightgames
